title: The Tall Guy (1989) Jeff Goldblum Emma Thompson Rowan Atkinson R
description: The classic British comedy written by Richard Curtis (Blackadder, The Vicar Of Dibley, Four Weddings & A Funeral, Notting Hill, Love Actually and The Boat That Rocked) and directed by the late great Mel Smith (Alas Smith & Jones, Not The Nine O'Clock News, The Princess Bride, Wilt and Bean: The Ultimate Disaster Movie). It features an unforgettable performance by Rowan Atkinson as a total prick called Ron Anderson (Lovingly based on Richard Curtis' real-life experiences as "The Other Man" in Rowan's "One-Man Shows") as well as boasting breakout performances by Jeff Goldblum and Emma Thompson (Including one of the most hilarious sex scenes ever filmed) and a... ahem... seminal soundtrack by Madness. Enjoy and spread your seed ;)
